p: The present study focused on two questions: (1) Does H. scandens root extract have allelopathic inhibition on the growth of A. philoxeroides? (2) What are the main secondary metabolites in H. scandens that potentially have allelopathy effects on A. philoxeroides? By answering these important questions, this study aimed to develop a potential method to control the invasion of A. philoxeroides by making use of the allelopathy effects of native plants if they exist.
